LanguageData.RT_DefectionHediff: Due to a genetic complication, {PAWN_nameDef} has been inflicted with the "{0}" defect.\n\nThis defect cannot be removed.
LanguageData.RT_JoinQueenLimit: Group with Queen: already carrying maximum metroids
LanguageData.RT_QueenHasGrownTooOld: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown too old for {QUEEN_nameDef} to nurture
LanguageData.RT_ReleaseAbilityTooltip:
Releases one of the metroids that is residing on the Queen's shell (eight maximum).
Carry occupancy is {0} out of {1}.
LanguageData.RT_RecallAbilityTooltip: Recall all released metroids on the field. Queen can currently recall {0} out of {1} metroids.
